title: GFRM Canonical Failure Report
description: Standardized schema for ARCA reports generated during GFRM R99 activation.

report_id.description: Unique cryptographic ID linking this report to the V_Fail snapshot.

activation_trigger.description: The specific trigger condition detected by GFRM.

failure_classification.description: ARCA's immediate classification of the fault's root nature.

checkpoint_reverted_to.description: Hash or identifier of the C(N-1) canonical checkpoint.

rollback_status.description: The result of the R99.4 state reversion attempt.

v_fail_snapshot_uri.description: Secure URI path to the cryptographically sealed M_Iso snapshot data.
